title: Scaling Towards Legalization
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Entourage Effect Capital Founder and StateHouse (STHZF) Chairman Matt Hawkins returns to discuss cautiously hunting for distressed assets, the transformative outlook of new regions going legal and developing legislation. Private equity, institutional capital wanting in on cannabis.
